title: 今次好大件事！！！「凰凰衛視」呢單野既重點係要幫香港洗白

replies.msg:
「凰凰衛視」呢件事既重點，唔係個女記者今次唔認自己係黎自「支那」
個重點係佢地冒認自己係香港既新聞機構
咁樣做唔單止有損香港新聞自由既公信力，令人以為香港新聞媒體既質素個個都好似支共媒體既質素；
佢地今次直接用「香港」名義挑美國總統機，係令到美國人對香港觀感變差，有損美港關係，根本就係離間緊香港人同埋美國人之間既關係同埋信任。係好好好好大件事。

我地要做既係立刻去Twitter「國際戰線」
用香港人既身分澄清：
1. 「凰凰衛視」唔係香港媒體，唔代表香港，係支共既媒體！
2. 香港人強烈譴責「凰凰衛視」盜用「香港」之名招遙撞騙，在美國總統造謠生事！
3. 我們香港人在美國這個艱難時刻，誓與美國人共同進退！

佢地支那人竟敢盜用「香港」之名垃圾！！！香港人要出手，呢個係外交關係既問題啊！

replies.msg:
英文聲明： （大家如有更媒可以自己再寫再改！如有Grammer問題亦幫助修改）

Dear Americans:
We are a group of true HongKongers who were born and raised in Hong Kong. Regarding the news that a female journalist from Phoenix TV, who criticized President Donald Trump for blaming China as the culprit of the current global health crisis caused by the “Wuhan Coronavirus”, we, as true local HongKongers, hereby declare the following:
1. Phoenix TV is a pro-China media controlled by the Chinese Communist Party. This journalistic agency is highly unpopular in Hong Kong, and their view is irrelevant to HongKongers. Phoenix TV is not representing Hong Kong.
2. We, as a group of people who love Hong Kong, reprimand Phoenix TV for usurping the name of “Hong Kong” with a view to defaming Hong Kong’s reputation.
3. During that difficult time caused by the “Wuhan Coronavirus”, we stand in solidarity with all our American friends.
Phoenix TV is not Hong Kong, and, Hong Kong is not China. We owe a debt of gratitude to President Donald Trump and the United States for everything they have done so far. And we will be American’s friend to fight against the horrible Communist regime in China.
God bless America,
HongKongers

replies.msg: Although Phoenix TV is based in Hong Kong, this media is not targeting HK audience.  Unlike truly local TV channels, most broadcasts of Phoenix are in Mandarin, not Cantonese (the principal language that HK people speak). They don't even have the local free TV license.  There is no local (HK) following in their programs at all.

replies.msg:
鳳凰衛視創辦人為劉長樂，在香港、深圳、倫敦、洛杉磯、北京設有分支機構。2006年，樓高26層的鳳凰深圳影視基地啓用，總建築面積超過10萬平方米。2009年，鳳凰衛視總部大埔工業區自置辦公樓新址啓用，樓高四層，總面積近4萬平方米。鳳凰衛視美洲台於2014年在美國洛杉磯落戶，面積近2800平方米。歐洲台則坐落倫敦西南繁榮商業區，總面積逾850平方米。而集團最新落成啓用，位於北京市朝陽區的鳳凰中心，佔地面積超過1萬8千平方米， 總建築面積超過6萬5千平方米。

鳳凰衛視控股有限公司於2000年6月30日在香港聯交所創業板掛牌上市。2008年12月5日，鳳凰衛視控股有限公司轉至主板上市。2016年9月，鳳凰衛視宣布，旗下的鳳凰香港已於2016年5月6日向香港通訊事務管理局遞交有關數碼地面電視廣播的本地免費電視服務牌照申請，但已於翌年8月以公司業務和投資方向改變及本地免費電視服務不利市況為由撤回申請。

英文聲明： （大家如有更媒可以自己再寫再改！如有Grammer問題亦幫助修改）

Dear Americans:
We are a group of true HongKongers who were born and raised in Hong Kong. Regarding the news that a female journalist from Phoenix TV, who criticized President Donald Trump for blaming China as the culprit of the current global health crisis caused by the “Wuhan Coronavirus”, we, as true local HongKongers, hereby declare the following:
1. Phoenix TV is a pro-China media controlled by the Chinese Communist Party. This journalistic agency is highly unpopular in Hong Kong, and their view is irrelevant to HongKongers. Phoenix TV is not representing Hong Kong.
2. We, as a group of people who love Hong Kong, reprimand Phoenix TV for usurping the name of “Hong Kong” with a view to defaming Hong Kong’s reputation.
3. During that difficult time caused by the “Wuhan Coronavirus”, we stand in solidarity with all our American friends.
Phoenix TV is not Hong Kong, and, Hong Kong is not China. We owe a debt of gratitude to President Donald Trump and the United States for everything they have done so far. And we will be American’s friend to fight against the horrible Communist regime in China.
God bless America,
HongKongers

Regarding the news that a female journalist from Phoenix TV, who criticized President Donald Trump for blaming China as the culprit of the current global health crisis caused by the “Wuhan Coronavirus”, we, as true local HongKongers, hereby declare the following:
1. Phoenix TV is a pro-China media controlled by the Chinese Communist Party. This journalistic agency is highly unpopular in Hong Kong, and their view is irrelevant to HongKongers. Phoenix TV is not representing Hong Kong.
2. We, as a group of people who love Hong Kong, reprimand Phoenix TV for usurping the name of “Hong Kong” with a view to defaming Hong Kong’s reputation.
3. During that difficult time caused by the “Wuhan Coronavirus”, we stand in solidarity with all our American friends.
Phoenix TV is not Hong Kong, and, Hong Kong is not China. We owe a debt of gratitude to President Donald Trump and the United States for everything they have done so far. And we will be American’s friend to fight against the horrible Communist regime in China.
God bless America,
HongKongers
